policies.name: Any User Policy
policies.description: Defines that any user can do something

policies.name: Only Premium User Policy
policies.description: Defines that only premium users can do something

policies.name: All Users Policy
policies.description: Defines that all users can do something

policies.name: Premium Resource Permission
policies.description: A policy that defines access to premium resources

policies.name: Protected Resource Permission
policies.description: A policy that defines access to any protected resource

clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add user roles to the access token

clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add acr (authentication context class reference) to the token

clientScopes.name: web-origins
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add allowed web origins to the access token

clientScopes.name: order.write
clientScopes.description: Write scope for Order for premium users

clientScopes.name: order.read
clientScopes.description: Read scope for Order for premium users
